ch.aplu.android

Class TurtlePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, GGActListener

    public class TurtlePane
extends GameGrid
    A class derived from GameGrid to create a environment where turtles lives. Turtles are instances of Actor and may be treated as such.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TurtlePane

        public TurtlePane()
        Creates a black GameGrid with 300x300 pixels (one pixel cell size). The navigation buttons are enabled:
        MENU: Run/Pause/Step
        BACK: Reset
        VOLUME_INCREASE, VOLUME_DECREASE: Increase/Decrease simulation period

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Clears the background by painting it black. Overrides GameGrid.reset().
        Overrides:
        reset in class GameGrid
